currentDoc: When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

The newscaster on TV has announced the widespread finding, sudden early death, birth defects, and other issues in nearly 100% of the grandchildren of those who took the drug. 
You look at your wife, and say "I'm glad we didn't take it."
 "I wouldn't trade our sweet grandchildren for anything.", she replies. You smile, and she smiles back. You both know that you've lived a good life.  "I'll admit", you say,

Y "I'll admit", you say, "I did lose sleep thinking about what 'could have been'. I thought about spending eternity with loved ones. There is always a price to pay though, and in this case, we would have hurt our own family. " "But we made the right choice, and I'm glad we did." 


You look at your wife, and say "I'm glad we didn't take it." "I wouldn't trade our sweet grandchildren for anything.", she replies. You smile, and she smiles back. You both know that you've lived a good life.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.
